description:
1.All books are divisible into two classes: the books of the hour, and the books of all time.
一切书籍都可以分为二类：即：一时之书与永久之书。
2.Friends are not books, yet books are friends. Friends may betray you, while books are always loyal.
朋友不是书，书却是朋友。朋友可能背判你，书却永远忠实。
3.He that knows little soon repeats it.
知识浅薄者，很快就回重复他所知的话题。
4.Isn't it a happy thing if you review what you have learned on time?
学而时习之，不亦乐乎?
5.The more you read,the more healthy and brave your spirit will be.
读书越多，精神就越健壮勇敢。
6.A man dies still if he has done nothing, as one who has done much.
既然无所事事亦难逃一死，何不奋斗终生。
7.Too great an eagerneto discharge on obligation is a species of ingratitude.
急于逃避履行义务是一种忘恩负义的行为。
8.Experience is what you get when you don’t get what you want. －Dan Stanfort
经验是当你没得到想得到之物时所得到的东西。 （美国实业家斯坦福）
9.A handful of common sense is worth a bushel of learning.
少量的常识，当得大量的学问。
10.Knowledge advances by steps and not by leaps.
知识只能循序渐进，不能跃进。
11.Learn wisdom by the follies of others.
从旁人的愚行中学到聪明。
12.It is good to learn at another man’s cost.
前车可鉴。
13.Wisdom is to the mind what health is to the body.
知识之于精神，一如健康之于肉体。
14.Experience is the best teacher.
经验是最好的教师。
15.Experience is the father of wisdom and memory the mother.
经验是知识之父，记忆是知识之母。
16.Dexterity comes by experience.
熟练来自经验。
17.Practice makes perfect.
熟能生巧。

title: 名言名句：关于读书英语经名言欣赏

description:
After you have read more than ten thousand volumes, you will find it easy to write as if God were there helping you.
读书破万卷，下笔如有神。
Classic A book which people praise and don’t read.
“经典之作”是人人皆称赞却不愿去读的书。
Coping with problems in our real life is the end, and reading is only one of the means to reach the end.
处理现实生活是目的，读书只是达到这个目的手段之一。
Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers.
知识来了，智慧却迟迟不前。
5.Knowledge is one thing, virtue is another.
知识是一回事，美德是另一回事。
A house without books is like a room without windows.
一幢没有书的房子，犹如一个没有窗户的房间。
The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
智慧就是懂得该忽略什么的技巧。
Reading without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
阅读不思考犹如吃饭不消化。
Knowledge is power . (Francis Bacon , British philosopher )
知识就是力量。 (英国哲学家 培根. F.)
The empty vessels make the greatest sound . (William Shakespeare , British dramatist )
满瓶不响,半瓶咣当。 (英国剧作家 莎士比亚. W.)
Love is ever the beginning of knowledge as fire is of light. －Thomas Carlyle
知识总是从爱好开始，犹如光总是从火开始一样。（英国历史学家卡莱尔）
When you want knowledge like you want air under water then you will get it. －Socrates
当你需要知识就像你在水底需要空气时，你准能得到它。--古希腊哲学家苏格拉底
